Uses of Class
io.netty.channel.epoll.EpollDomainSocketChannelConfig

Packages that use EpollDomainSocketChannelConfig
Package
Description
io.netty.channel.epoll
Optimized transport for linux which uses EPOLL Edge-Triggered Mode for maximal performance.
